name: Sesame Pita Chips
keywords: appetizer, dairy-free, nut-free, vegetarian, egg whites, pita, sesame seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil. Set aside. Separate the pita pockets into halves. Cut each half into 8 sections. Set aside.

Combine egg whites and sesame oil in a glass or ceramic bowl. Brush the egg-white mixture on both sides of the pita. Sprinkle both sides with sesame seeds. Place on the baking sheet and bake until crisp, about 10 minutes. Store in a cookie tin.
